Room.Name: Waterfront Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Waterfront Way, south of the Klondike Wheat Fields.
Room.LongDescription: The vast wheat fields seem to extend for miles to the east and west. On the southern side of the road, you can see some of the individual houses used by the farmers and their families. The personal residences are unique because they are separated; most housing in the city is communal due to the lack of space for individual houses. However, the communal housing is relatively spacious, so there isn't much complaining.
